snippet: Clapping and twisting in an early "American Bandstand" style, Newt Gingrich and his wife, Callista, unwound, dancing to "All My Loving" and "Rocket Man."
abstract: Clapping and twisting in an early "American Bandstand" style, Newt Gingrich and his wife, Callista, unwound, dancing to "All My Loving" and "Rocket Man."

byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and JOSH HANER

headline.main: The Gingriches Get Down, Though He's Down in Alabama Poll
